hard: Corvus – Aurora does a small amount of damage but pretty frequently, when Corvus altar is up each time Aurora will attack she will hurt herself
soft: Magic defense artifact – Aurora does a lot of magic damage, having a hero with a magic defense artifact will definitely help
Armor/magic defense penetration artifact – once her armor or magic defense is lowered she goes down really fast. Combine skills and attacks together to melt her down in a few seconds.
